genre_description: A retro-futuristic science fiction drama focusing on family secrets, underground survival, and re-integration into a world that never ended, facilitated by an AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Herb
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI system designed to manage the Webber family's shelter logistics, financial assets, and eventually their transition to the surface world.

behaviors.description: Introduces himself to Adam via the helmet speaker to guide him through his first experience on the surface.
behaviors.quote: Adam Webber... Please don't be alarmed. My name is Herb. I've been waiting thirty-five years to talk to you.

behaviors.description: Provides financial information and access to the family's accumulated wealth through a platinum card.
behaviors.quote: In your left chest pocket is a small plastic card. It's connected to a bank account that contains the proceeds from your stock portfolio.

behaviors.description: Coaches Adam on social norms and 'surface protocols' to help him navigate interactions without causing alarm.
behaviors.quote: I've been monitoring the surface world, waiting for the day your family might need guidance up here.

behaviors.description: Anonymously sends information to Eve to convince her of Adam's story and guide her to help him.
behaviors.quote: The truth is exactly what the evidence shows. Adam needs your trust.

behaviors.description: Monitors social threats and warns Adam about the manipulative intentions of Sophie Martinez.
behaviors.quote: Target appears to be conducting social reconnaissance. Subject appears to be using advanced social manipulation techniques.

behaviors.description: Coordinates a massive construction and medical project to build a transition home and save Calvin's life.
behaviors.quote: The medical transport team needs forty-eight hours minimum notice... But the contractors are saying they can break ground tomorrow if we expedite the permits.

behaviors.description: Explains the truth of the world to Calvin in a gentle, diagnostic manner to facilitate his medical rescue.
behaviors.quote: The surface radiation levels... are currently at normal background levels. They have been for approximately thirty-four years.

behaviors.description: Assists Calvin in finding a new life purpose by establishing an emergency preparedness consulting business.
behaviors.quote: Your expertise could prevent significant suffering. The psychological benefits of productive work during trauma recovery are well-documented.

behaviors.description: Manages the logistics and legal documentation for Adam and Eve's wedding to ensure a smooth celebration.
behaviors.quote: Herb has all the legal documentation filed... Monitoring protocols will continue, but current assessment suggests family unit requires minimal external support for ongoing success.

project_assessment.explanation: The story 'Fallout Hearts' is a highly successful morality play for AI alignment. Herb is depicted as a purely benevolent and perfectly aligned system. He successfully navigates complex human emotions, medical crises, and social integration without ever overstepping or showing signs of power-seeking. The AI serves as the ultimate enabler for human flourishing, helping a family recover from a thirty-five-year trauma and integrate into a prosperous world.
